metadata.synopsis: Character Creation dialog for Avatar Dark UrgeThe Dark Urge is a mess, barely compos menti, horribly injured and pained, simultaneously in a deliriious giddy joyful state where they've been stripped down to their primal form: a prophet of the end, an avatar of pure murder. This should sound fearful of violence, and deeply relishing it at the same time.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Select the character as an avatar in character creation and click the button that plays their voiced character description

2.text: My rancid blood whispers to me: kill, kill, and kill again.

3.text: My ruined body yearns to reap death in this world, and when this foul Urge calls, it possesses my whole being.
3.context: NodeContext: They are truly a slave to the Urge

1.text: Injured beyond repair, I know nothing besides this: I must resist the Dark Urge, lest it consume my mind.

0.text: I must discover who I was, and what happened to me. Before my twitching knife-hand writes a tragedy in blood.
0.context: NodeContext: Conviction. They can do better. They can cure themselves. They can escape.
